name: Remove Engine
title: Remove Engine
tag_line: Semi-transparent button that empties engines instantly.
description: Minimal BeamNG UI tile that instantly swaps the focused vehicle's engine slot to BeamNG's Empty state so you can stay in the scenario flow.
author: Khodar
message:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B]Skip the parts menu. Stay on the hill.[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[FONT=Verdana][SIZE=4]Remove Engine replaces the usual parts-configurator detour with a single frosted CTA. Tap it and the focused vehicle's engine slot is immediately set to BeamNG's Empty stateâ€”even on Automation cars and mods that never shipped an explicit empty part.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[CENTER][U]Highlights[/U][/CENTER]
[LIST]
[*]Always-on dashboard button that reflects when an engine can be removed
[*]Compatible with stock, Automation, and modded vehicles thanks to user-empty support
[*]Perfect for downhill soapbox runs, towing scenarios, cinematic shoots, and challenge retries
[/LIST]

[FONT=Verdana]Zip includes both the AngularJS UI app and the Lua helper (`extensions.core_RemoveEngine`).[/FONT]
